00026 Notifier::Notifier(char* pubip, int port, Sequencer* seq, int max_client, char* servname, char* terrname, bool pprotected, int smode) : exit(false)
00027 {
00028         lport=port;
00029         maxclient=max_client;
00030         server_name=servname;
00031         terrain_name=terrname;
00032         sequencer=seq;
00033         public_ip=pubip;
00034         passprotected=pprotected;
00035         wasregistered=false;
00036         servermode=smode;
00037         error_count=0;
00038 }
00039 
00040 Notifier::~Notifier(void)
00041 {
00042         exit = true;
00043 }
00044 
00048 bool Notifier::registerServer()
00049 {
00050         char regurl[1024];
00051         sprintf(regurl, "%s/register/?name=%s&description=%s&ip=%s&port=%i&terrainname=%s&maxclients=%i&version=%s&pw=%d", 
00052                 REPO_URLPREFIX, server_name, "", public_ip, lport, terrain_name, maxclient, RORNET_VERSION, passprotected);
00053         printf("Trying to register at Master Server ... (this can take some seconds as your server is being checked by the Master server)\n");
00054         if (HTTPGET(regurl) < 0)
00055                 return false;
00056 
00057         if(strncmp(httpresp+5, "error", 5) == 0) {
00058                 // print out the error.
00059                 printf("%s\n\n", httpresp+5);
00060                 printf("!!! Server is NOT registered at the Master server !!!\n");
00061                 wasregistered=false;
00062                 return false;
00063         }
00064         else
00065         {
00066                 strncpy(challenge, httpresp+4, 40);
00067                 challenge[40]=0;
00068                 //      printf("Challenge:%s\n", challenge);
00069                 printf("Server is registered at the Master server.\n");
00070                 wasregistered=true;
00071                 return true;
00072         }
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool Notifier::unregisterServer()
00076 {
00077         if(!wasregistered)
00078                 return false;
00079         char unregurl[1024];
00080         sprintf(unregurl, "%s/unregister/?challenge=%s", REPO_URLPREFIX, challenge);
00081         if (HTTPGET(unregurl) < 0)
00082                 return false;
00083 
00084         if(strncmp(httpresp, "2\r\nok", 5) >= 0)
00085                 return true;
00086         else
00087                 return false;
00088 }
00089 
00090 bool Notifier::sendHearbeat()
00091 {
00092         char hearbeaturl[1024] = "";
00093         char hearbeatdata[16384] = "";
00094         sprintf(hearbeaturl, "%s/heartbeat/", REPO_URLPREFIX);
00095         if(sequencer->getHeartbeatData(challenge, hearbeatdata))
00096                 return false;
00097 
00098         if (HTTPPOST(hearbeaturl, hearbeatdata) < 0)
00099                 return false;
00100         // the server gives back "failed" or "ok"
00101         if(strncmp(httpresp, "2\r\nok", 5) >= 0)
00102                 return true;
00103         else
00104                 return false;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void Notifier::loop()
00108 {
00109         bool advertised = registerServer();
00110         if (!advertised && servermode == SERVER_AUTO)
00111         {
00112                 printf("using LAN mode, probably no internet users will be able to join your server!\n");
00113         }
00114         else if (!advertised && servermode == SERVER_INET)
00115         {
00116                 printf("registration failed, exiting!\n");
00117                 return;
00118         }
00119 
00120         //heartbeat
00121         while (!exit)
00122         {
00123                 //every minute
00124 #ifndef __WIN32__
00125                 sleep(60);
00126 #else
00127                 Sleep(60*1000);
00128 #endif
00129 
00130                 if(advertised)
00131                 {
00132                         bool result = sendHearbeat();
00133                         if (result) error_count=0;
00134                         if(!result && servermode == SERVER_INET)
00135                         {
00136                                 error_count++;
00137                                 if (error_count==5) 
00138                                 {
00139                                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"heartbeat failed, exiting!");
00140                                         break;
00141                                 }
00142                                 else
00143                                 {
00144                                         logmsgf(LOG_WARN,"heartbeat failed, will try again");
00145                                 }
00146                         }else if(!result && servermode != SERVER_INET)
00147                                 logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"heartbeat failed!");
00148                 }
00149         }
00150 
00151         unregisterServer();
00152 }
00153 
00154 int Notifier::HTTPGET(char* URL)
00155 {
00156         int res=0;
00157         SWBaseSocket::SWBaseError error;
00158         SWInetSocket mySocket;
00159 
00160         if (mySocket.connect(80, REPO_SERVER, &error))
00161         {
00162                 char query[2048];
00163                 sprintf(query, "GET %s HTTP/1.1\r\nHost: %s\r\n\r\n", URL, REPO_SERVER);
00164                 //logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Query to Master server: %s", query);
00165                 if (mySocket.sendmsg(query, &error)<0)
00166                 {
00167                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Notifier: could not send request (%s)", error.get_error().c_str());
00168                         res=-1;
00169                 }
00170                 int rlen=mySocket.recv(httpresp, 65536, &error);
00171                 if (rlen>0 && rlen<65535) httpresp[rlen]=0;
00172                 else
00173                 {
00174                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Notifier: could not get a valid response (%s)", error.get_error().c_str());
00175                         res=-1;
00176                 }
00177                 //clean a bit
00178                 char* pt=strstr(httpresp, "\r\n\r\n");
00179                 pt+=4;
00180                 strncpy(httpresp, pt, 65536);
00181                 //logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Response from Master server:'%s'", httpresp);
00182                 // disconnect
00183                 mySocket.disconnect();
00184         }
00185         else
00186         {
00187                 logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Notifier: could not connect to the Master server (%s)", error.get_error().c_str());
00188                 res=-1;
00189         }
00190         return res;
00191 }
00192 
00193 int Notifier::HTTPPOST(char* URL, char* data)
00194 {
00195         int res=0;
00196         SWBaseSocket::SWBaseError error;
00197         SWInetSocket mySocket;
00198 
00199         if (mySocket.connect(80, REPO_SERVER, &error))
00200         {
00201                 char query[2048];
00202                 int len = (int)strnlen(data, 16000);
00203                 sprintf(query, "POST %s HTTP/1.0\r\n" \
00204                                "Host: %s\r\n" \
00205                                            "Content-Type: application/octet-stream\r\n" \
00206                                            "Content-Length: %d\r\n"
00207                                            "\r\n" \
00208                                            "%s", \
00209                                            URL, REPO_SERVER, len, data);
00210                 logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Query to Master server: %s", query);
00211                 if (mySocket.sendmsg(query, &error)<0)
00212                 {
00213                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Notifier: could not send request (%s)", error.get_error().c_str());
00214                         res=-1;
00215                 }
00216                 int rlen=mySocket.recv(httpresp, 65536, &error);
00217                 if (rlen>0 && rlen<65535) httpresp[rlen]=0;
00218                 else
00219                 {
00220                         logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Notifier: could not get a valid response (%s)", error.get_error().c_str());
00221                         res=-1;
00222                 }
00223                 //clean a bit
00224                 char* pt=strstr(httpresp, "\r\n\r\n");
00225                 pt+=4;
00226                 strncpy(httpresp, pt, 65536);
00227                 logmsgf(LOG_DEBUG,"Response from Master server:'%s'", httpresp);
00228                 // disconnect
00229                 mySocket.disconnect();
00230         }
00231         else
00232         {
00233                 logmsgf(LOG_ERROR,"Notifier: could not connect to the Master server (%s)", error.get_error().c_str());
00234                 res=-1;
00235         }
00236         return res;
00237 }
